alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 10:40PM PST until December 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER WILL CONTINUE THROUGH WEDNESDAY... Heavy snow has come to an end across much of northwest California. However, another storm system will produce moderate to heavy snow accumulations for elevations as low 1500 to 2000 feet on Wednesday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Southern Lake County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
